meanings.definition: Nyalas: a type of antelope found in southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The nyalas gracefully roamed the savannah.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of nyalas near the watering hole.
meanings.sent3: The nyalas decided to have a race with the zebras.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as elegant as a nyalas in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The nyalas' horns gleamed under the African sun.

meanings.definition: Nyalas: the plural form of the word 'nyala', referring to more than one of the antelope species.
meanings.sent1: Look at all those nyalas grazing together.
meanings.sent2: The nyalas in the herd were a magnificent sight.
meanings.sent3: The nyalas threw a party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of nyalas, a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The nyalas' presence added life to the landscape.
